articles.title: The magical medieval tale revealed by a hi-tech camera - BBC.com
articles.description: For centuries, an intriguing sequel to the tale of Merlin has sat unseen within the bindings of another book. Researchers have finally revealed it with cutting-edge techniques.

articles.title: Xbox testing new Game Hubs feature, update rolling out to select users now - Windows Central
articles.description: Members of certain Xbox Insider Program tiers can test Game Hubs, which gather information about a game all in one place.

articles.title: ‘Pixie’ was a canceled Pixel assistant that became Screenshots app - 9to5Google
articles.description: Ahead of the Pixel 9, Google was rumored to be working on a “Pixie” assistant. That never launched, but a new report reveals what happened.
